titleStmt.title: Yet more vvorke for a Masse-priest
More worke for a Masse-priest
titleStmt.author: Cooke, Alexander, 1564-1632.

editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A19251 of text S108652 in the English Short Title Catalog (STC 5664). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. The text has been tokenized and linguistically annotated with MorphAdorner. The annotation includes standard spellings that support the display of a text in a standardized format that preserves archaic forms ('loveth', 'seekest'). Textual changes aim at restoring the text the author or stationer meant to publish.

respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread

fileDesc.extent: Approx. 100 KB of XML-encoded text transcribed from 25 1-bit group-IV TIFF page images.

publicationStmt.pubPlace: Evanston,IL, Notre Dame, IN, St. Louis, MO

availability.p: This keyboarded and encoded edition of the work described above is co-owned by the institutions providing financial support to the Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership. This Phase I text is available for reuse, according to the terms of Creative Commons 0 1.0 Universal . The text can be copied, modified, distributed and performed, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.

Cooke, Alexander, 1564-1632. Worke for a Masse-priest.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Iones, and are to be sold by William Sheffard at his shop in Popes head Ally,

notesStmt.note: A revision of "More worke for a Masse-priest", in turn a much-expanded version of "Worke for a Masse-priest".
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
